alert.note: Alert for Bergen; Morris; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 3:21AM EST until January 11 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Ramapo River At Pompton Lakes affecting Bergen, Morris and Passaic Counties. For the Ramapo River...including Pompton Lakes...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ramapo River at Pompton Lakes. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Nuisance, low lying flooding, occurs near the dam in the Pompton Lakes. At 11.5 feet, South section of Pompton Lakes experiences flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 AM EST Thursday was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 9.9 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 03/31/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Stg Time Date Ramapo River Pompton Lakes 11.5 12.1 Thu 2 am 9.8 9.1 Crested &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 300 PM EST.
